channel.title: Texturing a Character In Zbrush?
channel.description: Heya,Does anyone know if it's possible to polypaint a high polygon model in Zbrush and then export the textures you draw? [img]https://img707.imageshack.us/img707/998/testtexturing.jpg[/img] ( YEAH it's Pretty Bad :/ ) I'm New at Zbrush...Please Help! (I saw the InFant Models for Black Mesa.And i'm inspired atm. :smiley: )

item.title: Texturing a Character In Zbrush?
item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
Oh… .well
i’m kinda new at this too.Here is one good tutorial
https://www.jcappelletti.com/z3tut02/ I hope it works for you
There are pretty cool tutorials for beginners on the net.Like the Gnomon’s Workshop Introduction for Zbrush.

Read full topic

item.title: Texturing a Character In Zbrush?
item.dc:creator: Guzzi
item.description:
I found a ton stuff on youtube. And also The company who makes Zbrush has a TON of tutorial videos that are extremely helpful.

I just found out about Zbrush so I’m brand stinkin new to it so I don’t have any advice to give. But you can probably give me some haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Texturing a Character In Zbrush?
item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
mattemuse:

I imagine it’s possible, although I don’t know how to do it. Similar to however you can export normal/displacement maps, I assume.

Well,i really hope so ! This thing is brilliant!
If anyone haves advices for character modeling,please shere them !
